name: Hawkley Extendable Dining Table - Watered Grey
description: We've given our Petworth Dining Table's timeless design an elevated twist. The Hawkley Extendable Dining Table has the same classic oval shape, but its legs are tapered and embellished with gold-coloured metal detailing, for an elegant, contemporary look. It's perfect for entertaining; when hosting, simply pull apart the centre of the table and remove the extra leaves. Turn the leaves horizontally and place them on the metal slides, connecting the table back together properly.
